title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for A'(15)

1 point is earned for the interpretation

A'(15)=-0.164 (or -0.163) The amount of grass clippings in the bin is decreasing at a rate of 0.164 (or 0.163) lbs/day at time t=15 days.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the interpretation

1 point is earned for A'(15)

A'(15)=-0.164 (or -0.163)

The amount of grass clippings in the bin is decreasing at a rate of 0.164 (or 0.163) lbs/day at time t=15 days.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for the interpretation

1 point is earned for A'(15)

A'(15)=-0.164 (or -0.163)

The amount of grass clippings in the bin is decreasing at a rate of 0.164 (or 0.163) lbs/day at time t=15 days.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for the interpretation

1 point is earned for A'(15)

A'(15)=-0.164 (or -0.163)

The amount of grass clippings in the bin is decreasing at a rate of 0.164 (or 0.163) lbs/day at time t=15 days.
